subject: Issues related to Execution of Utility Shifting work in BOT contracts.
text: 9Kar 7ryk4 TToTHrf wfean<ut TA1 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 91 (F3+ Tae7 a1r)rTTHrT 431T4) 44 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 101 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 5-5 g 6, 84zr-10, GTIDV, T Rrf-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No,11041/218/2007-Admn 07. 03.2013 PQLCY MATTERS_-TECHNCAL (127/2013) [Decision taken _in136lh Meeting of_Executive Committeel Subject: Issues related to Execution of Utility   Shifting Work in BOT contracts: The issues related to Execution of Utility Shifting Work in BOT contracts was discussed in 136ih Executive Committee held on 21.02.2013 and the following decisions were taken: i) Before approving estimates against various utilities, an undertaking from respective Utility agencies should be taken that in their proposed estimates, no provision against upgradation of the existing Utilities has been taken: The technical divisions should check the correctness of the estimates prepared by utility agencies   through Independent Engineer of the project: The same can accordingly be defined in its scope of work in the Standard RFP . 2 Accordingly, the proposals/estimates for Utility shifting shall henceforth be accompanied with an undertaking/certificate as per format enclosed herewith: 3 This issues with the approval of Zhairman: V.K Sharmax Chief General Manager (Coord./LA) To, Allolticers and employees ot HQ/ZO[ROs[PIUs[CMUs[Site Qlfices ?1 ?1 NHA 2l
